trends: There have been 112 other sightings in Orlando
There were no other sightings in Orlando on or around March 3rd 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was about to go to sleep when I heard a very strange and frightening sound near my window. I didn't do anything but then I heard it again and went to the window to see what it was, then I saw a very black elliptical object in the sky with many flashing lights streaming on it. The object moved to the left and then it moved down and then disappeared.
